pins.name: GND
pins.notes: Ground. Pins are marked with a circle.

pins.name: 3V3
pins.notes: 3.3 V power rail. The onboard regulator is rated to 3A.

pins.name: SCL
pins.notes: I2C clock line. Ports A and B and the GPIO bank share a common I2C bus, as do ports C and D.

pins.name: SDA
pins.notes: I2C data line. Ports A and B and the GPIO bank share a common I2C bus, as do ports C and D.

pins.name: SCK
pins.notes: SPI clock line. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: MISO
pins.notes: SPI master in/slave out. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: MOSI
pins.notes: SPI master out/slave in. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: TX/G1
pins.notes: User-configurable general purpose input/output. Unique to each module port. / UART serial transmit. See note below.

pins.name: R/G2
pins.notes: User-configurable general purpose input/output. Unique to each module port. / UART serial receive. See note below.

pins.name: G3
pins.notes: User-configurable general purpose input/output. Unique to each module port.

pins.notes: User-configurable general purpose input/output. Unique to each module port.

pins.name: GND
pins.notes: Ground

pins.name: 3V3
pins.notes: 3.3 V power rail. The onboard regulator is rated to 3 A.

pins.name: SCL
pins.notes: I2C clock line. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: SDA
pins.notes: I2C data line. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: SCK
pins.notes: SPI clock line. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: MISO
pins.notes: SPI master in/slave out. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: MOSI
pins.notes: SPI master out/slave in. Common for the entire board.

pins.name: G1
pins.notes: GPIO1. User-configurable general purpose input/output. Planned as software UART TX.

pins.name: G2
pins.notes: GPIO2. User-configurable general purpose input/output. Planned as software UART RX.

pins.name: G3
pins.notes: GPIO3. User-configurable general purpose input/output.

pins.name: VIN
pins.notes: This is the input to the onboard 3.3 V regulator, and typically comes either from USB or an external battery. As such, its voltage can range from ~3.4 V to 15 V. Please read the Powering Tessel documentation before using this pin. It is not recommended as source of significant current and should not be used to power the board.

pins.name: A6
pins.notes: ADC6. 10-bit ADC, referenced to GND and 3.3 V. Cannot function as anything else.

pins.name: A5
pins.notes: ADC5. 10-bit ADC, referenced to GND and 3.3 V. Cannot function as anything else.

pins.name: A4
pins.notes: ADC5. 10-bit ADC, referenced to GND and 3.3 V. Reconfigurable as digital GPIO.

pins.name: A3
pins.notes: ADC4. 10-bit ADC, referenced to GND and 3.3 V.

pins.name: A2
pins.notes: ADC3. 10-bit ADC, referenced to GND and 3.3 V. Reconfigurable as digital GPIO.

pins.name: A1
pins.notes: ADC2. 10-bit ADC, referenced to GND and 3.3 V. Reconfigurable as 10-bit DAC.

pins.name: G6
pins.notes: GPIO6. User-configurable general purpose input/output.

pins.name: G5
pins.notes: GPIO5. User-configurable general purpose input/output.

pins.name: G4
pins.notes: GPIO4. User-configurable general purpose input/output.
